random_max_start_delay.help: Maximum random delay value used in start-up sequence in milliseconds

radio-access-technology.help: Radio access technology to use. Value in integer: GSM=0, GSM_COMPACT=1, UTRAN=2, EGPRS=3, HSDPA=4, HSUPA=5, HSDPA_HSUPA=6, E_UTRAN=7, CATM1=8 ,NB1=9

control-plane-opt.help: Enables control plane CIoT EPS optimization

timeout-power-on.help: Timeout for device power on, 0 to not change

timeout-sim-pin.help: Timeout for SIM pin query response from the modem, 0 to not change

timeout-network-selection.help: Timeout for cellular selection response from the modem, 0 to not change

timeout-network-attach.help: Timeout for packet network attach response from the modem, 0 to not change

timeout-network-connect.help: Timeout for network connect and PDP context activation response from the modem, 0 to not change
